attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Provides a yang:data-and-time encoding of the date the voucher was created.

attributes.name: expiresOn
attributes.description: Provides a yang:data-and-time encoding of the date the voucher expires..

attributes.name: assertion
attributes.description: The manufacurer's assertion of how the owner was verified. ['verified', 'logged', 'proximity'].

attributes.name: idevidIssuer
attributes.description: The authority Key Identifier (as defined in Section 4.2.1.1 of RFC 5280) from the pledge's IDevID certificate.

attributes.name: pinnedDomainCert
attributes.description: An X.509 v3 certificate structure, as specified by RFC 5280, using PEM encoding, as defined in ITU-T X.509.

attributes.name: domainCertRevocationChecks
attributes.description: A processing instruction to the device that it MUST (true) or MUST NOT (false) verify the revocation status for the pinned domain certificate.

subAttributes.name: client-tokens
subAttributes.description: The URL of the device control application which can be used to access the app. This attribute is provided by the onboarding application when it creates the SCIM object for the device.

subAttributes.name: enterpriseEndpoint
subAttributes.description: The URL of the enterprise endpoint which device control apps uses to reach enterprise network gateway. When enterprise receives the SCIM object from onboarding app, it adds this attribute to the object and sends back the object as response back to the onboarding app.
